actor_awards.notes: A unique Hollywood figure who successfully reinvented himself from a 'pretty boy' musical crooner in the 1930s to a tough, cynical film noir anti-hero in the 1940s (famously playing Philip Marlowe). He later became a successful director and television producer (Four Star Television). He has three stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for Motion Pictures, Television, and Radio.

filmography.title: Murder, My Sweet
filmography.role_description: The hard-boiled private detective who gets entangled in a complex web of blackmail and murder while searching for an ex-con's missing girlfriend.
filmography.plot: Private eye Philip Marlowe is hired by a hulking ex-convict to find his missing girlfriend, leading him into a confusing web of intrigue and murder.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: 42nd Street
filmography.role_description: A juvenile lead and crooner in a Broadway show who falls for the inexperienced chorus girl thrust into the spotlight.
filmography.plot: A director puts on what may be his last Broadway show, and at the last minute a naive chorus girl has to replace the star.

filmography.title: Gold Diggers of 1933
filmography.role_description: A wealthy songwriter hiding his identity from his family while backing a Broadway show for his showgirl girlfriend.
filmography.plot: Four aspiring actresses try to make ends meet during the Great Depression while hoping for a big break on Broadway.

filmography.title: Footlight Parade
filmography.role_description: The juvenile lead and protege of a theatrical producer, featured in the elaborate 'By a Waterfall' number.
filmography.plot: A musical director tries to outdo his rivals by creating amazing stage productions for movie theaters.

filmography.title: The Bad and the Beautiful
filmography.role_description: A successful studio producer who recounts his experiences dealing with a ruthless movie mogul.
filmography.plot: An unscrupulous movie producer uses an actress, a director, and a writer to achieve success, regardless of the personal cost to them.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actress (Gloria Grahame)

filmography.title: Cornered
filmography.role_description: A Canadian airman who travels to Argentina to hunt down the Nazi collaborators who murdered his French wife.
filmography.plot: A Canadian veteran tracks down the Nazi collaborators who killed his wife to South America.

filmography.title: Pitfall
filmography.role_description: A bored, married insurance adjuster whose brief affair with a client leads to blackmail and murder.
filmography.plot: A married man's affair with a model leads to a web of intrigue involving a jealous private eye and a convict.

filmography.title: Christmas in July
filmography.role_description: An ambitious office clerk who goes on a spending spree after being tricked into thinking he won a slogan contest.
filmography.plot: A man mistakenly thinks he has won a large cash prize in a slogan contest and goes on a spending spree.

filmography.title: It Happened Tomorrow
filmography.role_description: A turn-of-the-century reporter who receives tomorrow's newspaper today, allowing him to scoop stories but also foresee his own death.
filmography.plot: A reporter receives a newspaper from the future, which allows him to scoop stories but also foretells his own death.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Sound, Best Music

filmography.title: Susan Slept Here
filmography.role_description: A Hollywood screenwriter who ends up looking after a juvenile delinquent over Christmas, his final film role.
filmography.plot: A screenwriter agrees to look after a 17-year-old delinquent girl over Christmas to study her for a script.

filmography.title: Cry Danger
filmography.role_description: An ex-convict who sets out to clear his name and find the real culprits of a robbery he was framed for.
filmography.plot: An ex-con tries to clear his name and find the $100,000 he was accused of stealing.

filmography.title: Johnny O'Clock
filmography.role_description: A cool gambling house partner who comes under suspicion of murder when a crooked cop and a hat-check girl turn up dead.
filmography.plot: A gambling house operator gets mixed up in murder and a love triangle with his partner's wife.

filmography.title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
filmography.role_description: One of the four young Athenian lovers in this lavish adaptation of Shakespeare's play.
filmography.plot: Shakespeare's comedy about two couples and a troupe of actors who get caught up in a quarrel between the King and Queen of the fairies.

filmography.title: The Tall Target
filmography.role_description: A police sergeant who uncovers a plot to assassinate Abraham Lincoln on a train before his inauguration.
filmography.plot: A detective tries to stop an assassination attempt on Abraham Lincoln during a train ride in 1861.

filmography.title: Station West
filmography.role_description: An army intelligence officer who goes undercover as a civilian to investigate a gold robbery in the West.
filmography.plot: An army intelligence officer goes undercover to investigate the murder of two soldiers and the theft of gold shipment.

filmography.title: To the Ends of the Earth
filmography.role_description: A determined government agent who tracks a global opium smuggling ring.
filmography.plot: A Narcotics Commissioner tracks a drug ring from San Francisco to Shanghai, Egypt, and Havana.

filmography.title: Dames
filmography.role_description: An eccentric songwriter and cousin who helps stage a show to win an inheritance.
filmography.plot: A millionaire reformer tries to stop a Broadway show, unaware that his own money is funding it.

filmography.title: Wonder Bar
filmography.role_description: A bandleader at a Parisian nightclub caught in a romantic web with his dancing partner.
filmography.plot: The owner of a Parisian nightclub loves his dance partner, who loves the bandleader, who is using her.

filmography.title: You Never Can Tell
filmography.role_description: A German Shepherd dog who is reincarnated as a human private detective to solve his own murder.
filmography.plot: A murdered dog returns to Earth as a human private detective to find his killer.

filmography.title: Hollywood Hotel
filmography.role_description: A saxophone player who wins a contract in Hollywood but faces studio politics.
filmography.plot: A saxophonist wins a talent contest and goes to Hollywood, but his contract is cancelled before he arrives.

filmography.title: The Reformer and the Redhead
filmography.role_description: A candidate for mayor who falls for a zookeeper's daughter, complicating his political image.
filmography.plot: A mayoral candidate is forced to fire a corrupt official, leading him to the official's fiery, animal-loving daughter.

filmography.title: Right Cross
filmography.role_description: A sports reporter who is the best friend and rival of a Mexican-American boxer.
filmography.plot: A champion boxer injures his hand and tries to hide it, while his friend, a reporter, falls for his girlfriend.

filmography.title: On the Avenue
filmography.role_description: A playwright who writes a satire about a wealthy family, only to fall in love with the daughter.
filmography.plot: A wealthy debutante is offended by a play that mocks her family, but she falls for the playwright anyway.

filmography.title: Twenty Million Sweethearts
filmography.role_description: A singing waiter discovered by a talent scout who becomes a radio sensation.
filmography.plot: A talent scout discovers a singing waiter and turns him into a radio star, but fame complicates his love life.

filmography.title: Flirtation Walk
filmography.role_description: A private in the Army who goes AWOL to avoid a scandal and later attends West Point.
filmography.plot: A private takes the blame for an officer's daughter's indiscretion, later reuniting with her when he becomes a cadet.

filmography.title: Hard to Get
filmography.role_description: A gas station attendant with a dream of opening a motel, who clashes with a wealthy man's daughter.
filmography.plot: A spoiled heiress tries to get back at a gas station attendant who refused to give her free gas, but they fall in love.
